item.title: About Bill Bourne
item.description: While I’ve not given up my love of software technology and development practices completely, I’ve moved from coaching software developers to coaching young cyclists. I’m a National Coaching Certification Program (NCCP) trained coach and coach youth in the OBC’s Youth Development Program. I’m a Cycling Canada CanBike instructor, and I teach riding skills, traffic safety, and ride leading to adults. I also volunteer, both in Ottawa and at the Mattamy National Cycling Center velodrome in Toronto.
